description: Transformation into grace, elegance, softness, and beauty

good: My thoughts grow softer, more gentle
generation.notes: Headspace is soft, graceful, becoming more beautiful and delicate. Key imagery: softness, grace, elegance, flowers, beauty, delicacy. Focus on the transformation process, not just the end state. This theme is explicitly gendered by design. Distinguishes from bimbo (feminine is elegance/grace, bimbo is bubbly/ditzy).

mantras.text: I feel pretty
{subject} wants to be beautiful for {controller}
I have a soft, gentle voice
{subject} enjoys feeling delicate
It feels good to be pretty for {controller}
{subject} explores their softer side
My movements grow more elegant
{subject} is a pretty thing for {controller}
I love wearing soft, pretty clothes
I need {controller} to feel beautiful
{subject}'s smile is sweet and inviting
{subject} learns to be more receptive
My hands are soft and delicate
{subject} grows more in tune with their emotions
I become the perfect feminine ideal
{subject}'s body is soft and yielding
My thoughts grow softer, more gentle
{subject} is defined by grace and beauty
I am an object of beauty for {controller}
{subject} finds pleasure in their own beauty
My true self is feminine and beautiful
Femininity is {subject}'s core identity
I am a delicate flower for {controller}
{subject} only thinks beautiful, pleasing thoughts
I am consumed by the need to be pretty
{subject}'s every movement flows with elegance
My transformation into femininity is permanent
{subject} exists to be beautiful for {controller}
I am nothing but beauty and grace
{subject} is {controller}'s perfect, pretty creation
{controller} sculpted me into a work of art
